xml:
Renacet<tm tmtype="reg"/> tablets Indications and dose

Hyperphosphataemia

By mouth

  • Adult

    475–950 mg, to be taken with breakfast and with snacks, 0.95–2.85 g, to be taken with main meals and 0.95–1.9 g, to be taken with supper, dose to be adjusted according to serum-phosphate concentration; maximum 6.65 g per day.

 Directions for administration

Manufacturer advises that other drugs should be taken 1 to 2 hours before or after Renacet to reduce the possible interference with absorption of other drugs.

Renacet tablets are taken with meals.
Patient and carer advice

Patients or carers should be given advice on how to administer Renacet tablets.
Clinical medicinal product information Clinical medicinal product information
